name: Rolling Window
shortDescription: Performs rolling window function. Predetermined is moving average. Window can be defined as a time period or as a number of observations

Variables.Name: ParameterName
Variables.Description: This is the stream's parameter to perform the window function on

Variables.Name: window_type
Variables.Description: Rolling window length type (None, Number of Observations, Time Period)

Variables.Name: window_value
Variables.Description: If Number of Observations: integer, if Time Period: 30sec, 1week, 3miliseconds, etc.
